Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.net.unix

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.net.unix 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.net.unix  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.net.unix used by org.apache.hadoop.net.unix 
    Class and Description
    DomainSocket
    The implementation of UNIX domain sockets in Java.
    DomainSocket.DomainChannel 
    DomainSocket.DomainInputStream
    Input stream for UNIX domain sockets.
    DomainSocket.DomainOutputStream
    Output stream for UNIX domain sockets.
    DomainSocketWatcher
    The DomainSocketWatcher watches a set of domain sockets to see when they become readable, or closed.
    DomainSocketWatcher.Entry 
    DomainSocketWatcher.FdSet
    The FdSet is a set of file descriptors that gets passed to poll(2).
    DomainSocketWatcher.Handler 
    TemporarySocketDirectory
    Create a temporary directory in which sockets can be created.
    TestDomainSocket.ReadStrategy 
    TestDomainSocket.WriteStrategy
